predictions.text: U.S. PCE price index excluding food and energy (core) year-over-year for August 2025 will be between 2.6% and 2.9%, as reported by BEA on 2025-09-27.
predictions.verification_criteria: BEA Personal Income and Outlays release dated 2025-09-27; confirm the core PCE YoY rate is within [2.6%, 2.9%].
monitoring_signals: August CPI and PPI details (shelter, core goods)
High-frequency credit/debit card and retail data
Nowcasts from regional Feds and private forecasters
predictions.rationale: Core PCE typically runs ~40–50 bps below core CPI; August CPI core moderation and softer goods prices point to high-2% YoY.

predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing PMI for September 2025 will print between 47.0 and 49.5 in the 2025-10-01 release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Institute for Supply Management report on 2025-10-01; headline PMI within [47.0, 49.5].
monitoring_signals: S&P Global US Manufacturing PMI flash/final
Regional Fed surveys (Empire, Philly, Richmond, Dallas)
New orders vs inventories spread, export orders
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing remains in mild contraction; orders/inventories balance suggests subdued momentum despite easing input costs.

predictions.text: The Freddie Mac Primary Mortgage Market Survey 30-year fixed mortgage rate will be at or below 6.40% in at least one weekly reading released by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Weekly PMMS publication by Freddie Mac; any reading through 2025-10-31 shows 30-year fixed <= 6.40%.
monitoring_signals: 10-year Treasury yield and term premium
Agency MBS spreads and mortgage application trends
FOMC communications and economic data surprises
predictions.rationale: Falling yields post-Fed cut and easing inflation should pull mortgage rates lower, even with sticky MBS spreads.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-15 close to 2025-10-31 close, NVIDIA (NVDA) will underperform the Nasdaq-100 Index (^NDX) by at least 5.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare percentage change in adjusted close from 2025-09-15 to 2025-10-31 for NVDA and ^NDX on Yahoo Finance; NVDA performance minus ^NDX <= -5.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: Semiconductor order/inventory updates and export controls
AI capex commentary from hyperscalers and enterprises
Factor rotations (momentum vs value/defensives)
predictions.rationale: Positioning and valuation are extended; rotation within AI beneficiaries and supply constraints risk near-term relative mean reversion.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-14, California Governor Gavin Newsom will veto AI safety bill SB 53 (or return it without signature), as recorded on the California Legislative Information site.
predictions.verification_criteria: Bill status on leginfo.legislature.ca.gov shows VETOED or returned without signature for SB 53 by 2025-10-14.
monitoring_signals: Governor’s public statements and industry lobbying
Amendment negotiations and stakeholder letters
Staff policy memos or trailer bill activity
predictions.rationale: Newsom has signaled veto concerns over implementation and innovation impacts, and similar tech bills have faced gubernatorial pushback.

predictions.text: The U.S. national average diesel price (AAA) will reach at or above $4.25 per gallon on at least one day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: AAA daily national average diesel price series shows any reading >= $4.25/gal by 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: ULSD futures and cracks, refinery maintenance schedules
Brent crude prices and Middle East risk premia
EIA distillate inventories and freight demand
predictions.rationale: Refinery maintenance, tight distillate stocks, and geopolitical risks elevate diesel price spikes into autumn.

predictions.text: EUR/GBP (Yahoo Finance: EURGBP=X) will close at or above 0.8600 on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Yahoo Finance daily historical data for EURGBP=X shows a daily close >= 0.8600 by 2025-10-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: BoE rate decisions and guidance
Eurozone data surprises vs UK data surprises
Risk sentiment and carry positioning shifts
predictions.rationale: A BoE cut and softer UK growth backdrop could weaken GBP versus EUR near term.

predictions.text: Euro area HICP core (excluding energy and unprocessed food) flash estimate year-over-year for September 2025 will be between 2.6% and 2.9%, per Eurostat release on 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Eurostat HICP flash press release on 2025-09-30 shows core (ex energy and unprocessed food) YoY within [2.6%, 2.9%].
monitoring_signals: Country CPI prints (DE, FR, ES, IT) ahead of flash
Energy base effects and services momentum
Wage growth indicators and PMI price components
predictions.rationale: Core disinflation continues on goods; services remain sticky but easing with slower wage momentum.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, OFAC will announce at least one sanctions designation under its North Korea-related program (DPRK), via public press release or sanctions list update.
predictions.verification_criteria: Treasury press release or SDN list update explicitly citing the DPRK program or E.O. authorities related to North Korea posted by 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: DPRK missile tests and satellite launches
Reporting on DPRK–Russia arms transfers
UN Panel of Experts findings and advisories
predictions.rationale: Persistent DPRK provocations and sanctions evasion networks make additional U.S. designations likely in the near term.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–Los Angeles weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-10-31 will be at least 15% higher than the 2025-09-05 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Drewry WCI Shanghai–Los Angeles rate in any weekly release through 2025-10-31 to the 2025-09-05 value; increase >= 15%.
monitoring_signals: Carrier GRI/blank sailing announcements
Panama Canal and Red Sea routing updates
U.S. import demand and retailer inventory data
predictions.rationale: Peak-season demand, routing disruptions, and canal constraints support higher Transpacific spot rates.

predictions.text: Copernicus ERA5 global surface air temperature for October 2025 will rank within the top 3 warmest Octobers on record, per the C3S monthly Climate Bulletin released by 2025-11-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: C3S monthly climate bulletin published by 2025-11-10 shows October 2025 global ERA5 temperature ranked 1st–3rd among Octobers.
monitoring_signals: ERA5 daily anomalies trackers
ENSO updates and ocean heat content
Regional heatwave frequency and persistence
predictions.rationale: Baseline warmth remains elevated; oceanic heat and persistent anomalies make another top-tier monthly ranking probable.

predictions.text: U.S. insured unemployment (continuing claims, seasonally adjusted) will be at or above 1.92 million in at least one weekly reading reported by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: U.S. Department of Labor weekly Unemployment Insurance Weekly Claims news release shows SA continuing claims >= 1,920,000 in any report through 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Initial claims trend and seasonal factors
Layoff announcements (Challenger report)
Job openings and hiring rates (JOLTS)
predictions.rationale: Gradual labor market cooling and rising separations should lift continuing claims modestly into early Q4.
